articles.title: Federal Officials Charge Four Officers in Breonna Taylor Raid
articles.description: The police in Louisville, Ky., fatally shot Ms. Taylor during a nighttime raid on her apartment. Officials said two officers had lied in order to get a search warrant for Ms. Taylor’s home.
